en.sentence: he has a cat which(that) has a small tail.

en.sentence: is this train which(that) leaves at three o'clock

en.sentence: This is a desk which(that) was made by my father.

en.sentence: the house which(that) was built by the carpenter is very strong.

en.sentence: the dog which(that) comes to our garden is always hungry.

en.sentence: what is the buildng which(that) stands near the station?

en.sentence: Can you see the cloud which(that) looks like a ship?

jp.sentence: その作家に書かれた(その)物語は多くの人に読まれるでしょう。

en.sentence: The story which(that) was written by the writer will be read by many people.

en.sentence: Let's go the restaurant which(that) opened last week.
